Boba shop was a front for an international car-burglary operation, D.A. Boudin says

An unassuming boba tea shop in San Francisco’s Tenderloin is believed to be a front for an international fencing operation, where street-level car burglars hand over stolen goods before the property is shipped off to countries including Vietnam and China, prosecutors said.
Recall of Chesa Boudin just got its first endorsement from an elected S.F. official

San Francisco Supervisor Catherine Stefani became the first elected official in the city to endorse the recall of District Attorney Chesa Boudin. She’s widely considered to be on the short list to replace him if the recall is successful.
